features: PACKAGE INCLUDES: 1 Gel Seat Cushion for Long Sitting + 1 Nonslip Cover; Cushion Specification: 17.3" x 18.5" x 1.2" ( 1160 GRAM); Large enough to fit car seats, office chairs or wheel chairs; Besides, unlike those made of heavy-duty material, this gel seat cushion is large in size, yet lightweight to bring along with you wherever you need it. And when you don't need it, it's compact enough to store easily;

Ergonomically Designed: Made with ultra-flex polymer, these gel cushions for pressure sores perfectly conform to your tailbone and absorbs pressure. They disperse and absorb pressure to alleviate pains on the sciatic nerve, coccyx, butt pain, hip pain, and tailbone pain, providing maximum comfort and support for your spine like never before while promoting your posture;

Thick & Firm, Not Going to Deform: With excellent thickness, our gel cushion for sitting is large and double in thickness, providing enough support and maximum comfort on most types of chairs; Its elastic self cooling gel material maintains its original shape durably, and restore to its original shape as soon as it is stretched and squeezed, and has superior durability than conventional cushion.

SAY GOODBYE TO SEAT SWEAT: Unlike those memory foam office chair cushions, this cooling seat cushion is with honeycomb design,the built-in, free-flowing air channels provide perfect heat dissipation and will prevent seat sweat and stay comfortably cool instead of heating where you sit. Our seat cushion adopts a honeycomb design, and the built-in free-flowing air channel prevents the seat from sweating, keeping your butt feel cool and comfortable;

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL & EASY TO CLEAN: Our gel cushion is ideal for use in a home office or long car journeys. It is also suitable for wheelchairs and has been crafted to alleviate pressure on the buttocks and hips. Besides, the zipper design and detachable seat cover can better clean the gel seat cushion. This way you can use the seat cushion without worrying about soiling the seat. Want to freshen it up? Just remove the cover and pop it in the wash.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PACKAGE INCLUDES: 1x Gel Seat Cushion for Long Sitting; 1x Nonslip Cover; Cushion Specification: 17.5" x 15.5" x 1.2" ( 1200 GRAM); Material: Premium Ultra-Flex Polymer Gel DO NOT COMPLAIN TOO MUCH ABOUT YOUR CHAIRS - GETTING A BETTER CHAIR IS COSTLY AND TROUBLESOME, JUST TRY AND ENJOY THIS COMFORTABLE GEL SEAT CUSHION! Unlike those made of memory foam, this cooling seat cushion is with honeycomb design, perfectly facilitating air circulation, evenly dispersing heat and effectively cooling your butt even after long time sitting;

The advanced column-buckling technology of this gel seat cushion, evenly disperses your body weight, eliminating pressure on the uncomfortable points, reducing pain for coccyx, tailbone, hip and other lower parts; These gel cushions for pressure sores, disperses and absorbs pressure to alleviate pains on the sciatic nerve, coccyx, butt pain, hip pain, and tailbone pain, providing maximum comfort and support for your spine like never before while promoting your posture; This gel seat cushion for long sitting, doubles in thickness, providing enough support and maximum comfort on most types of chairs; And its elastic gel material maintains its original shape durably, reliably providing comfortable soft support even after long time use;
PERFECT FOR WHEELCHAIR CUSHIONING Effective in relieving tailbone fatigue and nice in ventilation, this gel seat cushion makes you feel much more comfortable whenever you need to sit on wheelchairs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's the perfect complement to my herman miller aeron classic, it fits almost perfectly in the seat and it's very soft and squishy.I was getting some pressure points from the mesh during long sessions, as well as the hard edges. This cushion was just enough to get my thighs off the edges and soften those pressure points, while being thin enough to maintain the original ergonomics. It also makes unconventional positions much more comfortable.I don't think I'd recommend this for a wooden dining chair, but for my use case it is ideal. It may also be suitable for an older desk chair where the existing cushion is worn out.This is my first impression but I will update my review if it changes with long term use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Used with older Herman Miller Aeron
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to go with my Herman Miller Aeron (older version) because the mesh created pressure points over time. This fits almost perfectly in the seat (I have the C) and definitely helps to be able to sit comfortably for longer. It's not perfect, nothing is, we aren't meant to sit 24/7, but it helps me to work 8-12 hours at my desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Gel Seat Cushion
reviews.reviewText: Greetings Reviewer,I shopped and compared several foam and gel seat cushions made by many companies. My goal was to reduce the hardness of my old office chair where the chair cushion gave way and is ;hard' to sit on for any length of time. I chose a gel seat as it is softer than memory foam, foam retains body heat where as gel offers air cooling vents/cones, and it supports the tail bone much better for longer use in comfort. Plus the pricing was reasonable for this product to help extend the life of my office chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fir the most part, it works
reviews.reviewText: I worked very hard, and have lost 90 pounds. Who knew that besides having nothung ti wear, my biggest problem would be a boney butt! However, there it is. Tried more wedge shaped pads, but felt I was slidding off the chair. So after more looking I found this and it seems to be about right. The gel pad schmooches in the right places so I am secure in the chair and there are no other pressure sites. There is a small cut out for the tailbone, but it isnt quite as deep as I had hoped iit would be. It is much better than anything else I have tried. If I need more, I would definately repurchase. I like that it doesnt have a have a high lift. I can still sit in my recliner, my feet touch the floor, zand it diesnt cut circulation at my thighs. Goid purchase, and would reccommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It does not have the soft support .
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for more support , do not notice a difference in two weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband is bed ridden and has a sore on his backside. Using this cushion and alternating with a pillow and a blow up cushion helps keep the sore from staying irritated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, this is not very comfortable but the main problem is that it creeps off the chair and I have to stand up and readjust every so often. Definitely would not buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helps with pressure from being confined to a chair.
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable and helped the person heal a pressure sore.
